LocalCensorship.description: Enable local censorship (via DistilBERT, but currently unavailable)

AIType.description: AI server to use (only works on Custom AI compatible C.AI bots)

GPTLoc.description: OpenAI-compatible server. Only in effect if you choose OpenAI-Compatible

GPTKey.description: OpenAI-compatible server apikey. Only in effect if you choose OpenAI-Compatible

GPTModel.description: Model to use for OpenAI-compatible servers. Only in effect if you choose OpenAI-Compatible

OllamaModel.description: Model to use for Ollama servers. Only in effect if you choose Ollama.

LocalModel.description: HuggingFace model to use for Local GGUF mode.

Label1.value: No additional options available for Character.AI backend.
